thread.title: At Japan's Weird Hotel, receptionists, porters, concierge are all robots [Photos]
thread.title_full: At Japan's Weird Hotel, receptionists, porters, concierge are all robots [Photos]

title: At Japan's Weird Hotel, receptionists, porters, concierge are all robots [Photos]
text:
Yuri Kageyama, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS First posted: Wednesday, July 15, 2015 10:30 AM EDT | Updated: Wednesday, July 15, 2015 11:13 AM EDT Japan Robot Hotel Previous Next 
A receptionist robot, left, greets a hotel employee, right, demonstrating how to check in for the media at the new hotel, aptly called Henn na Hotel or Weird Hotel, in Sasebo, southwestern Japan, Wednesday, July 15, 2015. From the receptionist that does the check-in and check-out to the porter that�s a stand-on-wheels taking luggage up to the room, the hotel, that is run as part of Huis Ten Bosch amusement park, is �manned� almost totally by robots to save labor costs. (AP Photo/Shizuo Kambayashi) AP 
A receptionist robot performs during a demonstration for the media at the new hotel, aptly called Henn na Hotel or Weird Hotel, in Sasebo, southwestern Japan, Wednesday, July 15, 2015. From the receptionist that does the check-in and check-out to the porter that�s a stand-on-wheels taking luggage up to the room, the hotel, that is run as part of Huis Ten Bosch amusement park, is �manned� almost totally by robots to save labor costs. (AP Photo/Shizuo Kambayashi) AP

Huis Ten Bosch Co. President Hideo Sawada attends the opening ceremony of the robot hotel, aptly called Henn na Hotel or Weird Hotel, in Sasebo, southwestern Japan, Wednesday, July 15, 2015. From the receptionist that does the check-in and check-out to the porter that�s a stand-on-wheels taking luggage up to the room, the hotel is �manned� almost totally by robots to save labor costs. Sawada, who runs the hotel as part of his amusement park, insists using robots is not a gimmick, but a serious effort to utilize technology and achieve efficiency. (AP Photo/Shizuo Kambayashi) AP

Sawada, who runs the hotel as part of his amusement park, insists using robots is not a gimmick, but a serious effort to utilize technology and achieve efficiency. (AP Photo/Shizuo Kambayashi) AP
